name: Popple to Mahou no Crayon
overview: "Popple and magical crayon" is a pop-up adventure that reads popping out picture books. Although the lukewarm popple jumps into various picture books in search of food, the story stops halfway for some reason in a stray book story. So try drawing a picture book with a strange magical crayon and grab items in a picture book, a change will occur in the picture book and the story will develop. Please do it well and complete the story of the picture book.
